snippet: President Xi Jinping’s investor-friendly talk after a key leadership meeting failed to impress the Asian business community, with complaints that it was long on goals but short on details.
lead_paragraph: President Xi Jinping’s investor-friendly talk after a key leadership meeting failed to impress the Asian business community, with complaints that it was long on goals but short on details.

headline.main: China’s Vow on Market Gets Tepid Reception in Asia
headline.print_headline: China’s Vow on Market Gets Tepid Reception in Asia
